name: Mind The Chain
description:
Waking up in a purposely obtuse world. You are shackled by mysterious floating spheres. Freedom seems like only  an arms reach away.  Will the chain be your oppressor?  Or your ticket to enlightenment?

Developed in Unreal Engine. Submission for Game Off 2019, sponsored by GitHub.

WARNING: The cabling system can be a little wonky and buggy. However, this should not prevent you from progressing levels, even when it's doing non intuitive things. Apologies for any frustrations. If you're interested in hearing more about it, stay tuned for a coming post mortem.

-Special Thanks To -
